alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hampden (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 7:42PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Tolland, northeastern Hartford and south central Hampden Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 741 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Windsor Locks, or over Windsor, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Enfield, Windsor, Agawam, South Windsor, Bloomfield, Longmeadow, Suffield, East Longmeadow, Ellington, Windsor Locks, Somers, East Windsor and East Granby. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
